scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a bust of Christ, rendered with a dark purple robe. He has long, dark hair and a beard, and his right hand is raised in a gesture of blessing, with two fingers extended. His left hand holds a globe, symbolizing his dominion over the world. The background is a vibrant blue, adorned with delicate gold scrollwork and small star-like motifs, suggesting a divine or celestial setting. A halo, indicated by radiating lines and decorative elements, surrounds his head.
